title: Operators who own the outcomes
proofs: Ops, finance, or CX lead with decision authority
Willing to co-build and give fast feedback
Processes already documented in some form
notFit: No dedicated operator to partner with
Pure experimentation with no clear workflows

title: Data lives in the cloud
proofs: Core work happens across SaaS tools and APIs
You can provision service accounts or OAuth access
Security review process ready to kick off
notFit: On-prem systems only with no integration path
Shadow IT with blocked admin access

title: Urgency to reclaim capacity
proofs: Nights and weekends are used for repetitive tasks
Leadership feels the drag on roadmap velocity
You have a backlog of automation ideas with no owner
